attributes.action: Uphold Net Neutrality, Abolish "unlimited internet" Better measures should be in place for customers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most ISP's in the UK do not follow net neutrality and ISP's restrict Bit Torrent as well as other services from it's customers. Also advertise speeds that are incorrect without being clear. Also unlimited internet, is limited, Which is lying. Customers are being treated as pets.
